entries.abort: Receiving abort code. Failure is not acceptable... attempting to relocate stolen cargo.
entries.angry_disable: Rebel scum! We and our allies will find you and crush you! You haven't heard the last of us!
entries.arrival_phase_1: Stay on the alert, pilot. We've located a perfect target for your recovery mission. Our systems detect a hyperspace surge in your area.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Timing couldn't be more perfect. The target has arrived. Watch out for its escort.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.capture_complete: Station Command: < Excellent, the droid has control of the ship and it's repaired. Provide a safe escort for him pilot. >
entries.capture_phase_1: Unit has breached vessel. Subduing crew.
entries.capture_phase_2: Unit in place with full control of vessel. Repairing engine system now.
entries.capture_started: Tactical Computer: < Scanning ... ... Capture underway. Stand by. >
entries.complete: Unit reached safety point. Moving target vessel to rendez-vous coordinates with allied freighter.
entries.escort_remaining: Station Command: < Nice one, pilot! Only %DI enemy vessels left in the area. >
entries.escort_wiped_out: Station Command: < Amazing! The escort vessels have been destroyed. Disable that ship, pilot! We're counting on you. >
entries.failed_destroy: Pilot! The target ship was destroyed, but it looks like the cargo was transferred to another ship. We are attempting to locate that ship. Return to the Rori Station for now.
entries.failed_escape: The enemy has hyperspaced out of your immediate area. We are attempting to relocate that ship now.
entries.panic_1: Ship sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.panic_2: Ship sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.quest_disable_d: Disable the Borvo Bomber with the cargo of repair droids. Keep in mind that its escort will try to eliminate you and won't hesitate to try and eliminate the bomber itself just to keep you from recovering it.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the captured fighter to a safe hyperspace jump point.
entries.quest_location_d: Track down the Borvo pirate that stole the shipment of repair droids.
entries.quest_recover_d: The space assault droid is trying to get control of the ship. Keep it safe in the meantime.
entries.recovery_success: That was a close one. Good work, pilot. We should be able to get our cargo off of that ship.
entries.split_quest_alert: Station Command: < We are attempting to relocate the cargo. Stand by.
entries.target_disabled: Target has been disabled. We're launching the space assault droid now, keep the ship safe while it's doing its work.
entries.taunt_1: You won't get away with this, rebel!
entries.taunt_2: Destroy them! Don't let them get away! You'll pay, Rebel scum, you'll pay!
entries.taunt_3: This isn't your fight, Rebel scum!
entries.thanks_1: Ship sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned escape path.
entries.thanks_2: Ship sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned escape path.
entries.title: Yavin System: Recover stolen cargo from Borvo pirates
entries.title_d: Borvo pirates made off with the shipment of repair droids you were just escorting to the Rori Station. Recapture that shipment and ensure that it can safely make the jump back to the Naboo System.
